meanings.definition: A unit of power equal to one hundred millionth of a watt.
meanings.sent1: An abwatt is a very tiny amount of power.
meanings.sent2: The scientist measured the electricity in abwatts.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally plugged my phone into an abwatt outlet and it barely charged.
meanings.sent4: Her energy was like an abwatt, barely noticeable but still present.
meanings.sent5: The abwatt measurement was so small, it was hard to comprehend its significance.
